options.cubeside.clearchatbyserverchange: Delete chat history when switching servers. (only Server-Networks)
options.cubeside.thirdpersonelytra: Automatically switch to third person when flying with the Elytra
options.cubeside.timestampcolor: Change the color of the timestamp
options.cubeside.chatlimit: The maximum number of messages that will be saved
options.cubeside.displaychatinfo: Shows your current channel and chat partner
options.cubeside.dropitemfancy: Drop items with an alternate animation
options.cubeside.elytraalarm: Plays an alarm sound when flying below the minimum build height
options.cubeside.savemessagestodatabase: Stores all messages in a database and loads them when you join a server
options.cubeside.daysthemessagesarestore: Number of days how long messages are stored
options.cubeside.showinvisiblearmorstand: Shows invisible armor stands when you are holding an armor stand
options.cubeside.showinvisibleentitiesin: Show invisible entities in spectator mode
options.cubeside.simplesignglow: Remove font outline on glowing signs (improves performance)
options.cubeside.afkpling: Plays a sound when you are AFK
options.cubeside.actionbarshadow: Removes the text shadow in the ActionBar above the hotbar
options.cubeside.keepentityhitbox: Keep entity hitbox status after restart
options.cubeside.entityhitboxdirection: Entity Hitbox looking direction and eyelevel
key.cubeside.showentitiesinspectator: Show invisible entities in spectator mode
options.cubeside.tpasound: Plays a sound when you get a teleport request
options.cubeside.removechristmaschest: Remove christmas chests (Client needs to be restarted!)
options.cubeside.gamemodeswitcher: Allows to switch gamemodes using F3 and F4 keys
options.cubeside.woodstriping: Wood striping at right click with axe
options.cubeside.creategrasspath: Create grass path at right click with shovel
